attributes.action: Work Apprenticeship for Growing Young Youths !!
attributes.additional_details:
Community Centre in our society plays a very pivotal role in building community spirits. Young kids needs guidance and inspiration  through work apprenticeship programmes by source  of technology.

Education is the engine of any successful nation. We should take a note from countries like India and China where we have millions people graduating each year by paying for their studies and haven't got the perks
like England. We need a proper education system where people who cannot afford University should get a chance from government to learn short skilled work in the society. Rather then we hiring the services from other countries we can train our young youth on those services. ex - IT field.

Young people needs to be disciplined through parents from the growing stage. Young people need proper structure in life where they can learn and develop.

To make a structured youth a structured approach by parents and government needs to be taken.

Thank you
